problem_text: For trapezoid Q R S T, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If T S = 2 x + 2, Q R = 5 x + 3, and P M = 13, find T S.
compact_text: For trapezoid QRST, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If TS = 2x+2, QR = 5x+3, and PM = 13, find TS.
annotat_text: For trapezoid QRST, M and P are midpoints of the legs. If TS = 2x + 2, QR = 5x + 3, and PM = 13, find TS.
